verses.text: The \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add as\add* the \w rivers|strong="H6388"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: he \w turneth|strong="H5186"\w* it whithersoever he \w will|strong="H2654"\w*.

Every \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in his own \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w pondereth|strong="H8505"\w* the \w hearts|strong="H3826"\w*.

To \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* and \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \add is\add* more \w acceptable|strong="H0977"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* than \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*.

An \w high|strong="H7312"\w* \w look|strong="H5869"\w*, and a \w proud|strong="H7342"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \add and\add* the \w plowing|strong="H5215"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \add is\add* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.\f + \fr 21.4 \ft An…: Heb. Haughtiness of eyes\f*\f + \fr 21.4 \ft the plowing: or, the light\f*

The \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* of the \w diligent|strong="H2742"\w* \add tend\add* only to \w plenteousness|strong="H4195"\w*; but of every one \add that is\add* \w hasty|strong="H0213"\w* only to \w want|strong="H4270"\w*.

The \w getting|strong="H6467"\w* of \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* by a \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \add is\add* a \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w* tossed to and fro \w of|strong="H5086"\w* them that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

The \w robbery|strong="H7701"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall \w destroy|strong="H1641"\w* them; because they \w refuse|strong="H3985"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 21.7 \ft destroy…: Heb. saw them, or, dwell with them\f*

The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is\add* \w froward|strong="H2019"\w* and \w strange|strong="H2054"\w*: but \add as for\add* the \w pure|strong="H2134"\w*, his \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \add is\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w*.

\add It is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in a \w corner|strong="H6438"\w* of the \w housetop|strong="H1406"\w*, than with a \w brawling|strong="H4079"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* in a \w wide|strong="H2267"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 21.9 \ft a brawling…: Heb. a woman of contentions\f*\f + \fr 21.9 \ft a wide…: Heb. an house of society\f*

The \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w desireth|strong="H0183"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* findeth no \w favour|strong="H2603"\w* in his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 21.10 \ft findeth…: Heb. is not favoured\f*

When the \w scorner|strong="H3887"\w* is \w punished|strong="H6064"\w*, the \w simple|strong="H6612"\w* is made \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*: and when the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* is \w instructed|strong="H7919"\w*, he \w receiveth|strong="H3947"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

The \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add man\add* wisely \w considereth|strong="H7919"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: \add but God\add* \w overthroweth|strong="H5557"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* for \add their\add* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*.

Whoso \w stoppeth|strong="H0331"\w* his \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* at the \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, he also shall \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* himself, but shall not be \w heard|strong="H6030"\w*.

A \w gift|strong="H4976"\w* in \w secret|strong="H5643"\w* \w pacifieth|strong="H3711"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*: and a \w reward|strong="H7810"\w* in the \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w* \w strong|strong="H5794"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*.

\add It is\add* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* to the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: but \w destruction|strong="H4288"\w* \add shall be\add* to the \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*.

The \w man|strong="H0120"\w* that \w wandereth|strong="H8582"\w* out of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H7919"\w* shall \w remain|strong="H5117"\w* in the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the \w dead|strong="H7496"\w*.

He that \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H8057"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w poor|strong="H4270"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: he that \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* and \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* shall not be \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*.\f + \fr 21.17 \ft pleasure: or, sport\f*

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w ransom|strong="H3724"\w* for the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, and the \w transgressor|strong="H0898"\w* for the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*.

\add It is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H0776"\w*, than with a \w contentious|strong="H4079"\w* and an \w angry|strong="H3708"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*.\f + \fr 21.19 \ft in…: Heb. in the land of the desert\f*

\add There is\add* \w treasure|strong="H0214"\w* to be \w desired|strong="H2530"\w* and \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* in the \w dwelling|strong="H5116"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*; but a \w foolish|strong="H3684"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* spendeth it \w up|strong="H1104"\w*.

He that \w followeth|strong="H7291"\w* after \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* and \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \w findeth|strong="H4672"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, and \w honour|strong="H3519"\w*.

A \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add man\add* \w scaleth|strong="H5927"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*, and casteth \w down|strong="H3381"\w* the \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* of the \w confidence|strong="H4009"\w* thereof.
Whoso \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* and his \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from \w troubles|strong="H6869"\w*.

\w Proud|strong="H2086"\w* \add and\add* \w haughty|strong="H3093"\w* \w scorner|strong="H3887"\w* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, who \w dealeth|strong="H6213"\w* in \w proud|strong="H2087"\w* \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*.\f + \fr 21.24 \ft in proud…: Heb. in the wrath of pride\f*
The \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* of the \w slothful|strong="H6102"\w* \w killeth|strong="H4191"\w* him; for his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w refuse|strong="H3985"\w* to \w labour|strong="H6213"\w*.

He \w coveteth|strong="H0183"\w* \w greedily|strong="H8378"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* long: but the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* and \w spareth|strong="H2820"\w* not.

The \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add is\add* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*: how much more, \add when\add* he \w bringeth|strong="H0935"\w* it with a wicked \w mind|strong="H2154"\w*?\f + \fr 21.27 \ft with…: Heb. in wickedness?\f*

A \w false|strong="H3577"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*: but the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w constantly|strong="H5331"\w*.\f + \fr 21.28 \ft A…: Heb. A witness of lies\f*

A \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w hardeneth|strong="H5810"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: but \add as for\add* the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*, he \w directeth|strong="H0995"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 21.29 \ft directeth: or, considereth\f*
\add There is\add* no \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* nor \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* nor \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

The \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \add is\add* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* against the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: but \w safety|strong="H8668"\w* \add is\add* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 21.31 \ft safety: or, victory\f*
